item.description:
Come join us on April 22 for Omnivore's Dilemma and learn all about how we see food and make our choices. And bring your carnivorous instincts because we'll be sinking our teeth into the succulent choices at Gauchos Brazilian Steakhouse in Manchester.

For those of you who haven't experienced a Brazilian Steakhouse, it's a really fun experience that requires a large appetite. You'll be treated to at least a 1/2 dozen different types of meat plus a fabulous salad bar.

So, hope you can join us!!

Jason

group.name: The Southern NH Books and Brew Club

item.name: The Omnivore's Dilemma
